website_summaries.verdict: This raw vegan protein powder contains all natural ingredients – no artificial chemicals or additives found here.
pros: Stands out for its organic formula containing a mixture of pea protein isolate, sprouted brown rice protein and artichoke protein isolate
Boosts immune system while encouraging weight loss
Variety of flavors available including an unflavored option

customer_reviews.title: Now containing XYLITOL - sugar alcohol
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of this product since the released years ago. I used to pay $20 for the 2lb size. I stocked up. I use the product for muffins, protein pancakes, and anything else you can think of. It was hard to find for a while and now the price has gone up by 50%. THEY USE XYLITOL now. This is a more recent addition. Now it hurts my stomach, causes bloating, gas and every other nonsensical thing sugar alcohols are known to cause. WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT. I used this for my meal prep business and went through about 25lbs a month. Now it’s on to something without garbage. Check your label. Things have changed.
customer_reviews.author: marrykaypoppins

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This mixes really well, tastes great, filling, keeps me from being hungry, easy to digest and no reactions, gluten free and great price. I drink this daily. I mix it with cacoa, collagen and coffee flavored vitamin b. It is so good. I have seen great results with muscles not atrophying as rapidly while drinking this. Very pleased and been drinking it for a long time now. Recommend and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I used to buy it from Body Building.com, but I save shipping with my Amazon prime so there ya go! This product is my favorite vegan protein. I have tried about 3 other versions and this is still the best. It mixes well and does not separate like Vega does.(gross) The banana version is the best in my opinion. I make a frozen pineapple, kale, parsley and raw fusion juice in my Nutri Bullet Rx. I get all the fiber and protein. This stuff makes it amazing!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT: macros, taste, and blendability
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vegan protein powder to replace my Vega (just couldn't do the chalkiness) and don't use milk based ones due to intolerance. MACROS: Most of the other protein powders had HIGH carbs and reviews of leftover stevia taste. Low carb, low fat, HIGH protein TASTE: No stevia taste. The peanut butter and chocolate is not very sweet and has a richer taste. I prefer this over most other chocolate powders. BLENDABILITY: This is a HUGE category for me and I didn't see enough reviews on this. Blends GREAT in both milk and water. No chunks, no chalky bits left on your teeth. Just a blended protein drink to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bohaczyk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the complaints. I've tried a lot of different protein powders and this is a favorite. Great vanilla flavor. Mixes very well with peanut butter and banana. I use two servings for a meal replacement- keeps me full a long time. None of the protein powders taste great without adding stuff in. My blood sugar is much better and - the best thing- I DON'T CRAVE SWEETS ALL AFTERNOON.
customer_reviews.author: Former culinary student

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what to expect, even from all the rave about this product. Surprisingly it tasted good, and digested great. The digestion part was what I most wanted, and like about this product. I have tried a few such products, but none as tasty and as pure as this brand. I am greatly satisfied with this purchase, and will recommend to family and friends. I am new to the vegan diet, and found drinking this a shake twice a day, helps me out greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Valor

customer_reviews.title: Tastes just like a banana nut bread shake
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first order so much that I've already ordered and received that order as well. It mixes great with almond milk in a blender. I'm going to experiment with the powder next week and see if I can create a banana nut powder, cream cheese and chia seed dessert using almond milk. I usually do this flavor in the morning before leaving for work as it gives me more energy than regular Slim Fast Diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: furbysmama

customer_reviews.title: Best plant based protein out there
customer_reviews.text: Above all the best plant based protein. It's not gritty or unflavored like many other plant based proteins. It not too sweet like many of the whey proteins. It's just right. It mixes well, taste good in shakes, in oatmeal and also by itself. It is also great for its price. I will be a life time buyer. When you find a product like this one you just stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Plant Protein
customer_reviews.text: This powder exceeded my expectations! Tasty, mixes well, great price, & easy to digest. It is a little sweet but I think you could tone it down with milk or milk alternative. The flavors stand out equally, it's a nice flavor of banana & nut. If I could change one thing it would be the fructose in the powder. Overall I'm happy with the powder.
customer_reviews.author: O SWFL

customer_reviews.title: Not too sweet. Doesn't turn to sludge if mixed in advance ...
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Mixes really well though a little foamy if made in blender. Not too sweet. Doesn't turn to sludge if mixed in advance and put in fridge. Larger size tub is a good value compared to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Elaine Kunigonis

customer_reviews.title: Great Plant Based Powder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for over a year now, and really like it. I don’t usually drink it alone, as all plant proteins taste chalky. This one really isn’t that bad. But i do blend with almond milk and frozen strawberries and it tastes amazing. I will continue to order this product.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Gross.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know where to start. If you ever wanted to know what a banana nut muffin that someone farted on tastes like, this is the way to go. On top of having a weird taste, it is INSANELY sweet even being mixed into 28oz of unsweetened almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: MLavore

customer_reviews.title: Gritty but good.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves, wife hates. Looking for non-whey protein alternatives. First brand of vegan we have tried. Doesn't cause any stomach upset - check. We both enjoy the flavor - check. Tastes like boxed vanilla pudding. We use it primarily in overnight oats so the flavor & sweetness is good for that. Cons: It is very thick & very gritty. You could actually make pudding out of if you reduced the water per serving a little. The texture is a bit mealy/gritty, even after blending well with tepid water for 2+ minutes, or soaking overnight in water. Wife cannot stand the texture, even in the oats. House divided.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lanier

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to milk, and soy proteins are known to contain hormones that aren't good for men, so this non-soy, non-milk based product is perfect for my needs. It's also the best-tasting protein powder I've ever tried; this flavor especially. It can be a bit grainy, so I recommend using a blender to mix it. Adding a banana can also help with the smoothness, though it's still good when mixed with water only.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein!
customer_reviews.text: This protein is amaaazing compared to other plant based proteins I’ve tried. I also can down a shake without the uncomfortable stomach aches that would ensue with other proteins. I’ve only tried the banana nut flavor so I can’t really rate one flavor over another.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good, blend-ability is good, ingredients are good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with this protein powder. Most importantly for me, it is easy to digest. It blends well and doesn't taste bad. I prefer mixing it with only almond milk, or almond milk and a little plain kefir. When I added it to a fruit smoothie, I felt like the protein powder ruined the smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I love rawfusion products. Honestly, I've tried so many protein supplements and this brand is the winner, hands down. The quality ingredients, the taste and the mixing ability make it excellent for blenders such as the ninja. It's no muss, no fuss. I enjoy the vanilla flavor more than the chocolate, which is why I only gave 4 stars. It gets a little chalky too if you use too much. Otherwise, makes great tasting smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Sarena F.

customer_reviews.title: the best veggie protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely amazing! I had to stop eating all dairy products hence no more whey protein. I haven't been able to find a good tasting vegetable protein powder with a good profile till I tried this one. In the past I have tried four different brands with no success (brown rice, pea protein, veggie protein..).All taste like chalk and super bland. Normally I stay away from vanilla because no matter what is just blah. Not this one. Tastes really yummy.
customer_reviews.author: mimibe

customer_reviews.title: This is the best non-dairy protein powder out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best non-dairy protein powder out there, in my opinion. One issue to bring up with the manufacturer / Amazon: PLEASE figure out your pricing. The prices fluctuate on these products all the time, and it's really hard for me to understand why. I would buy the 4 pound tub every month if it weren't for these price changes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H

customer_reviews.title: It is a bit sweet. But the vanilla mixes well with anything else ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit sweet. But the vanilla mixes well with anything else you might want to add. I like mixing mine with almond milk, ice, a banana, pressed peanuts and flaxseed. I disagree about the chalk taste. One of the better proteins ive had. The best protein ive had that is actually healthy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a long time now. Tastes better than any other protein powder I've had, mixes well, gluten free, and soy free.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this protein powder. I ordered the vanilla flavor. It's too sweet so instead of using the measuring cup included I only use a teaspoon. I recommend getting the unflavored variety.
customer_reviews.author: Robin F. LeCavalier

customer_reviews.title: best soy-free vegi protein powder
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful product. i have tried many protein powders and several vegetarian versions. raw fusion is the best vegi protein powder i've found. and it doesn't taste like cardboard, like many other vegetarian powders, and to top it all off it's soy-free. i mix it with cereal, oatmeal, or juice. it tastes great and breaks down well (no clumping). i have some every day with breakfast and often after a work out. it's a great alternative to whey protein for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lochhead

customer_reviews.title: Little to no balloon feeling, but way too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: I have a really hard time reaching my protein goal for the day, so I recently started drinking protein shakes. This shake is good in that i just drank 2 in one day and I don't feel incredibly bloated, but it is much too sweet tasting for me. I have tried with vanilla soy milk (I know that is sweet alone) and even with water and I can barely tolerate it and I normally love sweet foods.
customer_reviews.author: Veronicxtx

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Flavor-wise, I prefer the Peanut Chocolate Fudge flavor but I like this too. I don't want the calories in whey proteins so I decided to try a plant based protein and I really liked this one - it was much gentler on my stomach than other proteins I've tried and it mixes really well with a shake. I wouldn't use this or any other protien with water or fruit smoothies as I've yet to find one that tastes good or blends well. I typically blend a scoop of this with a banana, milk (regular or almond), scoop of peanut butter and ice and it tastes like a milkshake. I look forward to it after my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Scott0804

customer_reviews.title: Very low sugar vegan protein shake mix with great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love this (I have the banana flavor) and plan to order another one soon, and I want to try the Chocolate Peanut Butter flavor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy R

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegan Protien
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder! I use to use whey protein but it would upset my stomach every time. Then I switched to a plant-based protein and have never looked back. This taste’s amazing and isn’t chalky. I mix it with my fruit smoothies in the morning and it adds just a nice hint of vanilla without being too much. I recommend this brand to all of my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Karrah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE IT!!! flavor is great with no after taste. Keeps me full and it is a great meal substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Mabeline!

customer_reviews.title: good protein
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this protein powder. its really good especially in smoothies. Very good for vegans too. please give it a try. Loved the vanialla bean most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Tastes so good you might slap ya mama!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE your product! I’ve had peanut chocolate fudge, vanilla bean, and banana nut AND I’m super impressed! I suddenly became lactose intolerant and used to use whey protein a lot so I’m SO glad that I found this! Best plant based protein I’ve ever found! FYI I always use a blender and mix other things in it, but seriously this stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, mixes well.
customer_reviews.text: I have weird food allergies so using standard protein powder was not an option. This is a great alternative. The taste is about what you'd expect for vanilla protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good Clean Protein
customer_reviews.text: Best flavor and not grainy. I like vanilla so I can add different fruits for a variety of flavors
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Harris

customer_reviews.title: Taste is amazing, was skeptical about it
customer_reviews.text: Taste is amazing, was skeptical about it, since most of vegan protein taste bad. Not this one, great quality , mix very well in my morning smoothies, and great for baking healthy desserts too. Strawberry Chocolate flavor is the bomb😋😋😋
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, and easy to mix
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, and easy to mix. Great protein, and good texture. Only "complaint" is the super huge container in which it comes. Is this really necessary? It's almost half empty, so I don't see the need for such a large container. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Chirp

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet...
customer_reviews.text: This product has great nutrition and is a wonderful plant-based protein source. However, I find this product to be really too sweet. I know that may sound crazy but I wish it were a bit toned down. It uses stevia but still - wow - too sweet for me. I can't drink this straight with water or almond milk, instead I juice some greens, carrots, and other bland vegetables, add a scoop of this protein powder, blend with some ice, and my drink is then edible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Good for the lactose intolerant. Taste and texture are OK. Mixes well.
customer_reviews.text: I am lactose intolerant and this protein powder suits me well. The vanilla taste is OK. It has a medium level of sweetness and no gross aftertaste. I think I'll try a different flavor next time though. The texture is a little chalky but it's quite tolerable. Two scoops mixes well with 28 ounces of cold water in a shaker cup. It doesn't settle or require excessive shaking to keep it dissolved.
customer_reviews.author: DJ E.

customer_reviews.title: The flavor tasted great. The shipping was fast
customer_reviews.text: The flavor tasted great. The shipping was fast. The only negative I have is that it does taste a little gritty and chalky. It doesn't taste well mixed with water, it taste gross. It taste great mixed with lactose free milk. Oh one more thing when you open the container it looks like you got cheated out of 900g, your not. I have friend who is a phramisty she measured it for me and everything is right on the money. So I hope my little review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Manuela Flores

customer_reviews.title: Gets very foamy....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the vanilla bean flavor, tastes good but the only problem is, it gets really foamy after shaking it in the shaker bottle.... I'm probably not going to purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: John HK Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product brand. It is less grainy than a lot of protein powders I have tried and has a clean, light sweetness (some, like Vega One, seem too sweet to me). I love this one and the peanut butter chocolate fudge one.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Banana Nut flavor and I was pretty nervous, not gonna lie
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Banana Nut flavor and I was pretty nervous, not gonna lie, but I love this protein. I don't make protein shakes, I always put protein in my oatmeal and do overnight oats and I eat it every day with peanut butter. 10/10 would recommend also because I have a really bad issue with whey protein since it gives me an upset stomach and gas but I don't feel that way with this protein at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegan Protein I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is only for the Vanilla and Unflavored varieties, but I strongly recommend giving them a shot. I've triedabout a dozen different brands and, for me, nothing else comes close!
customer_reviews.author: William Hannah

customer_reviews.title: love, Love, LOVE This Vegan Plant-based Protein!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is plant based, I love how it tastes, I love the protein-to-calorie ratio, and I love how I feel when I drink it. I've tried a lot of protein powders and RawFusion is my favorite by far! I add it to plain yogurt and sprinkle some cinnamon on top and it tastes like raw banana bread dough - YUM!
customer_reviews.author: ProPrimer

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste good
customer_reviews.text: I drink a protein drink every morning and thought I would try a new product. This protein powder has the worst texture and taste. I hate wasting things, but I had to throw this away. The flavor wasn’t even enhanced when I added fruit or peanut butter. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried this protein powder blended in smoothies. The taste and texture reminds me of Quaker banana nut instant oatmeal. You almost have to chew it. All the plant based proteins I've tried have been gritty, but this one has been the worst. Taste is ok, but I won't purchase again after this tub is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Unlike many other plant based proteins it is not grainy and has the perfect amount of sweetness to it
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I have been using Rawfusion for some time now and you just cant go wrong with this product. Unlike many other plant based proteins it is not grainy and has the perfect amount of sweetness to it. its not bitter nor to sweet. I will be a life time buyer where ever it is sold
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Carter

customer_reviews.title: Beyond amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many vegan protein powders in search of the perfect way to increase my protein intake while decreasing calories. All of the others I've tried we're gritty, funny after taste, or downright revolting. This actually tastes GOOD!!! It's smooth, creamy, sweet, and filling. Blends easily with other flavors for versatility. Stop looking. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: SusanElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love RawFusion...not sure about Peanut Chocolate Fudge!
customer_reviews.text: I love Raw Fusion supplements. I feel great, and don't get an upset stomach, they way I do from other supplements. I think the Vanilla tastes quite good. I tried the Peanut Chocolate Fudge, and I don't think it's as good. I would definitely pick the Vanilla. Great product, overall!
customer_reviews.author: b. trollinger

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other vegan protein powders and this one is our favorite. It doesn't give our smoothies that chalky taste that others seem to. Love it! Now I just wish they'd either fill the container all the way to the top or make a smaller container instead of leaving so much space at the top...
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, chalky texture
customer_reviews.text: Has a good chocolate/mocha-like flavor and just sweet enough for my taste. Also, the macros are what I was looking for in a protein supplement. But I didn't care for the chalkiness of it. I think I'll try a different brand next time just to see what else is out there, but I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and the taste and price are great ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and the taste and price are great however the sodium is a little high if you are using it more than one time a day. I use my protein powders 2 times a day with 4 scoops so I have to substitute another powder the other times to reduce the sodium.
customer_reviews.author: Dani W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good taste. I wish they offered a 10lb size. The 4lb keeps running out so quick. I like mixing two scoops after workout. I noticed dairy products (whey) made my digestive system upset so this the best bang for your buck that I've found. Vanilla flavored is so so I like chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Taste and bendability are ok. I've had better. Artificial taste.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Galante

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as promised. I love the taste, rich and chocolatey with very little gritty residual (so common in vegan proteins). I also thought the price was great! I can't tolerate whey proteins, and it is hard to find a really good vegan product. Thanks so much, I love it, and my daughter loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Berman

customer_reviews.title: I have heard that all flavors are good but I really love the Vanilla Bean
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so delicious! I will use this by itself with water or chocolate milk or in mixer with my leafy greens. This protein is the highlight of my afternoons after a hard workout. I have heard that all flavors are good but I really love the Vanilla Bean!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Was Five..>Moving Down...Back to MRM Veggie Elite I go...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of MRM's Veggie Elite Protein, and thought i'd found a new favorite because the flavor of this one is slightly better to me. But the price keeps changing on this one and going up. The amount is less and the price is higher. I'm going back to MRM.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Erdkamp

customer_reviews.title: great taste and easy to mix so far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate peanut tastes great. I have used eas whey for years and wanted to get away from dairy based supplements. A few weeks in and so far so good. I have not taken it long enough to see any impact on my training or body but the taste is much better than eas, muscle milk, or old school myoplex. It also mixes very easily compared to whey... but more than one serving at a time seems to cause me some stomach sensitivity... like too much beans might cause. I expect I will to get used to digesting it and all will be good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davenport

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great chocolate flavor I love this blended with some frozen banana and almond milk after a workout or as breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting plant based protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I am a vegan and have tried so many plant based protein powders and they all taste like cardboard!!! Until I found this brand in this flavor Banana Nut... AMAZING!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Terri La Calle

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is super light, which I appreciate
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is super light, which I appreciate... I buy this brand for the nutritional aspects, not the flavor. More flavor = more sugar = a crap product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste is ehhhh.....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this due to have some diet issues with having too much dairy products. Well it helped fix this issue, I also purchased it because other reviews said it had awesome taste. Unsure if I got a bad batch, but the taste is far from good. I wasn't expecting it to taste amazing because that's not the point of this product, but I can barely get it down. Needless to say, but I'm already looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Plant protein good...whey protein bad.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff replaces all whey protein for me. The chocolate and vanilla are very good. No extra sweetening required and it mixes pretty well with just a hand shaker.
customer_reviews.author: kniTp

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it! Wish it had more protein but being ...
customer_reviews.text: I Iove the taste!! specially because it doesn't have artificial sweetener it doesn't leave an aftertaste. I mix with fruit and when I crave chocolate I just add cocoa powder. I recommend it! Wish it had more protein but being a vegetarian powder what can you expect.. Pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Falla

customer_reviews.title: <3 this product!!  no sugary aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I can't go without this in the morning. One of the only protein powders that satisfies me till lunch AND does not have a sugary aftertaste!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.L. Ko

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Thought I was having a reaction with Whey, and guess what!? No acne, no bloating, Raw Protein is the way to GO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product for vegetarian protein source. Sweetness and flavoring got to be enough after the second batch but that is pretty much a standard issue for me with most protein powders. Definitely recommend trying it. Wish they made one that was just less sweetened.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea smith

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I'm not began but prefer a plant based powder and most aren't great, but Rawfusion is great.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla flavor too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this plant based protein powder since I had heard that it's one of the best out there. I like the content and the texture isn't terrible; however, the flavor I got (Vanilla Bean) was way overpowering and sweet. I like to mix protein in with my smoothies and this protein powder makes them way too sweet. I do like the content and texture, so perhaps I will try a different flavor if I ever re-order.
customer_reviews.author: LauraK

customer_reviews.title: Better tasting protein than most I've had
customer_reviews.text: Wished they'd drop the price back to where it was. Better tasting protein than most I've had. Mixes alright. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Texture/taste was worse than average
customer_reviews.text: Taste/texture left a lot to be desired. Had sort of a chalky/bland texture. I prefer PES’ Vegan Powder’s taste between the two but would use again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: weird aftertaste but great texture so ill put up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for People with Food Allergies
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking forever for a protein powder that I wasn't allergic to. I have a bad reaction when I consume anything with whey in it, and had pretty much given up the search for something to match my needs. I'm also not a sweets person, so it is kind of too much since it tastes a lot like cake. I usually blend with pineapple or other fruits to offset the sweet taste.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best vegan protein powder on the market
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A vegan protein powder that tastes great. A bit gritty but that's negligible given the creamy nature of this mix. Vega watch out... You've got serious competition!
customer_reviews.author: tnmng00

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Giving it one star because I couldn't give it zero. I buy dozens of things on Amazon each year and never feel compelled to write a review, but this stuff is really bad. I am not picky about protein powders but this is awful tasting and doesn't mix well. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be called vanilla cake batter
customer_reviews.text: This is excessively sweet and tastes like vanilla cake batter. Not the taste that I want in my smoothie but I gave it 3 stars because I have found ways around that sickening cake batter taste. I wouldn't but this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: FabDelka

customer_reviews.title: It is very very sweet, I mix it my kids milk and they ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very very sweet, I mix it my kids milk and they don't mind. It's the most "clean" protein powder I could find for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: reallycleverusername

customer_reviews.title: four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Vegan. Mixes well with soy milk using a shaker. I look forward to it after a workout. BUT what happened to the price?? The vanilla bean flavor is up $10!! I like the product but won't be buying it at that price. 4 stars for the product. 2 stars for the price increase.
customer_reviews.author: REK

customer_reviews.title: great tasting! Not super grainy or chalky like the ...
customer_reviews.text: great tasting! Not super grainy or chalky like the other plant based proteins I've tried. I mix it with almond milk and its delicious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Taste is okay, nothing special. I use about 10 grams mixed with 8 oz. of yogurt, 1/4 cup soy milk, ice chips, blended.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It actually taste better than expected. Mixes well in my shaker bottle (i usually stack with other protein powders). Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: usmc2cpu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great in my smoothies. Gives the energy that I need without the calories or fat.
customer_reviews.author: Rancho La Loma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he only eats raw/vegan. He loves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: KBizzle

customer_reviews.title: Taste is fine. Like that it is non gmo and vegan
customer_reviews.text: Taste is fine. Like that it is non gmo and vegan. Ingredients are great, no preservatives or artificial stuff. But it goes down like swallowing sand. I even tried it with almond milk and blended it a LONG time in my blender. Still like sand. I actually had to cough it down. returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Low carb, high protein
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and ratio of low carbs to high protein
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin E. Vardigan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and an excellent price/use ratio, causes no indigestion or constipation, and has a decent taste. I mix mine with almond milk and cold coffee and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisDiesDaily

customer_reviews.title: It's a meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: I like the product a lot, it's not gritty and has a great flavor and all natural ingredients. I use it in my fruit shakes as a meal replacement
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Bossi

customer_reviews.title: Better than whey.
customer_reviews.text: I use it twice daily. Whey gives me gas, but this doesn't. It's cleaner than whey too. I tolerate it well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael gone rouge

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I take it regular and it mixes well with smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harden

customer_reviews.title: I wish the sodium was a lot less. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sodium was a lot less. I can not use it more than 1 time a day due to high sodium. I use Garden of life 2 times a day to supplement the protein.
customer_reviews.author: Dani W.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really like this flavor, to me it almost tastes like a light mocha. Goes great with almond milk and a banana. I have no side effects from the powder, it's easy to digest, no bloating or stomach cramps. I use it almost everyday for my morning shake or for a afternoon snack. I been using it for a year now, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dell L

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this protein! It is a little grainy because it is plant based protein but it tastes so good. Peanut butter and chocolate mix is a big WIN for me!
customer_reviews.author: QuelFace

customer_reviews.title: I usually buy Plant Fusion, but wanted to give ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Plant Fusion, but wanted to give this one a try because whey seems to bother me. I didn't have any reaction to this product, but it did not seem to mix well. The flavor was ok, but I think I will go back to Plant Fusion because the texture is much easier to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Talarico

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The claim that this product has "incredible taste" is definitely subjective. To my palette, the vanilla bean flavor has a subtle wood flavor covered by the intense sweetness and aftertaste of the stevia. AWFUL!!!!! It made my smoothies dense and heavy; not to mention my muscle mass eroded. Definitely NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. I can't do whey so I'm glad I've found such a good vegetable protein product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: If you like banana this is for you
customer_reviews.text: If you like banana this is for you, but the taste can be a bit overwhelming. I enjoyed blending almond milk, bananas, and almond or peanut butter with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keys

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Chalky and does not mix well. Flavor is bland and not good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Moore

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try based on the reviews. I was pleasantly surprised by the taste. I used to order PlantFusion but I decided to try something else due to taste. This product is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! When mixed properly not gritty
customer_reviews.text: My new breakfast staple also mid afternoon snack. No soy no dairy and vegan! Fantastic! When mixed properly not gritty.
customer_reviews.author: Renee G.

customer_reviews.title: Very good Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this protein powder I do not mind the taste or texture and I love how it mixes very well with frozen fruit and almond milk. It is more fullfilling than other protein powders that i have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: C Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great high quality product with a great flavor and texture. 4 stars only given due to all the extra space in the container. I can't speak for anyone else, but the container I received was both half empty and half full...
customer_reviews.author: Startle

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, but they have raised the price so much I had to switch to another brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: SAN Nutrition RawFusion Plant Protein Powder, Natural Chocolate, 2 Pounds
product_meta.description: Flavor:Natural Chocolate| Size:2-PoundRAWFUSION's exclusive mix of pea protein isolate, sprouted brown rice and artichoke protein concentrate, and EFA-rich sunﬂower oil matrix have created a patent-pending formula that is ideal for vegans, and is a sensible choice for non-vegans as well. In fact, with over 4.5 grams of BCAAs per serving, RAWFUSION's amino acid proﬁle rivals that of milk protein. RAWFUSION is an unequaled vegan protein formula for anyone seeking an ultra-healthy lifestyle and unwilling to make sacriﬁces.
